items.translated_title: Meta’s own research found parental supervision doesn’t really help curb teens’ compulsive social media use
items.content: An internal research study at Meta found that parental supervision may not help teens regulate their social media, and teens with trauma are more inclined to overuse social media.

items.translated_title: European Parliament blocks AI on lawmakers’ devices, citing security risks

items.translated_title: WordPress.com adds an AI Assistant that can edit, adjust styles, create images, and more

items.title: These are the countries moving to ban social media for children
items.creator: Aisha Malik
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: These are the countries moving to ban social media for children
items.content: Australia was the first country to issue a ban in late 2025, aiming to reduce the pressures and risks that young users may face on social media, including cyberbullying, social media addiction, and exposure to predators.
